trans-unit.source: Represents a literal code fragment that can be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以加以編譯的常值 (Literal) 程式碼片段。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit> can represent a literal block of code that is included directly in the source without modification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit> 可以表示常值直接包含在未經修改的來源的程式碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit> stores a section of code, exactly in its original format, as a string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit>一段程式碼，完全以其原始格式儲存，做為字串。

trans-unit.source: The CodeDOM does not translate literal code fragments.
trans-unit.target: CodeDOM 不會轉譯常值的程式碼片段。

trans-unit.source: Literal code fragments are stored and output in their original format.
trans-unit.target: 常值的程式碼片段會儲存，並以原始格式輸出。

trans-unit.source: CodeDOM objects that contain literal code are provided so developers can encapsulate code that is already in the target language.
trans-unit.target: CodeDOM 物件，其中包含常值的程式碼被為了讓開發人員可以將封裝已在目標語言的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit.Value%2A> property contains the literal code fragment as a string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit.Value%2A>屬性包含做為字串常值的程式碼片段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit.LinePragma%2A> property is optional and specifies the position of the code within a source code document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit.LinePragma%2A>是選擇性屬性，指定資料來源的程式碼文件中的程式碼的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit> class by using a string that represents literal code.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit>使用字串，代表常值的程式碼的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor you should also set the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個建構函式您也應該設定<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The literal code fragment to represent.
trans-unit.target: 要表示的常值程式碼片段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit> class by using a string that represents literal code.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetCompileUnit>使用字串，代表常值的程式碼的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line and file information about where the code is located in a source code document.
trans-unit.target: 取得或是設定在原始程式碼文件中，程式碼所在行和檔案的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma" /> that indicates the position of the code fragment.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma" />，表示程式碼片段的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the literal code fragment to represent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要表示的常值程式碼片段。
